DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of K-134 for the treatment of intermittent claudication.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of K-134 for the Treatment of Intermittent Claudication
DOC.criteria: Stable claudication symptoms Lower extremity amputation Signs or symptoms of critical leg ischemia (CLI) Uncontrolled hypertension Tachycardia Poorly controlled diabetes Hypercholesterolemia
